General.Name: Megalestari Epack Sentosaraya Pt
General.Description: PT Megalestari Epack Sentosaraya Tbk engages in plastic packaging business in Indonesia. It offers PET, metallized PET, PE, and BOPP; high barrier and recyclable; Matte, soft touch, and gloss finishes; laminates; and child resistant packaging, bottom and side gusset, lay flat, tear notche and hang hole, press to close zipper, and standing pouches. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Megalestari Epack Sentosaraya Tbk is a subsidiary of ePac Flexibles Asia Pte. Ltd.
